description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-30018:

1. Download and install the relevant update packages for your system version as listed below:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5037771
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5037771
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5037770
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5037768
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5037768
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit Systems: KB5037768
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit Systems: KB5037768

2. Restart your system after installation to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the improper link resolution that can lead to privilege escalation within the Windows kernel.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system corresponds with the appropriate version as stated above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.

**Update Packages**:
- For manual installations, download the updates from the following links:
   - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

Additionally, verify the build number of your Windows version:
- 10.0.22631.3593 for Windows 11 Version 23H2
- 10.0.22621.3593 for Windows 11 Version 22H2
- 10.0.22000.2960 for Windows 11 Version 21H2
- 10.0.19045.4412 for Windows 10 Version 22H2
- 10.0.19044.4412 for Windows 10 Version 21H2.
